description:
The API doc properly states that device is ignored at volume_attach [1] in case of libvirt driver but the same note is missing from the server create bdm:device_name parameter. However libvirt driver ignores the device names in both cases [3]

[1]https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=create-server-detail,attach-a-volume-to-an-instance-detail#attach-a-volume-to-an-instance
[2]https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=create-server-detail,attach-a-volume-to-an-instance-detail#create-server
[3]https://review.openstack.org/#/c/189632/
title: api-ref: POST /servers does not note that bdm:device_name is ignored by libvirt driver

comments.content:
The API doc properly states that device is ignored at volume_attach [1] in case of libvirt driver but the same note is missing from the server create bdm:device_name parameter. However libvirt driver ignores the device names in both cases [3]
